directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C).
Combine apples, 2 tablespoons flour, nutmeg, and salt.  Mix together egg, sour cream, 3/4 cup sugar, and vanilla;  blend into the apple mixture.  Pour filling into unbaked pie shell.
Cream together 1/3 cup sugar, 1/3 cup flour, and 1/4 cup butter or margarine.  Set topping aside.

Bake for 15 minutes.  Reduce temperature to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C), and continue baking for 30 minutes.  Remove pie from  oven, and sprinkle with topping.  Increase temperature to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C), and bake pie for 10 more minutes.  Cool.
ingredients: 2 cups apples - peeled, cored and chopped
1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch single crust pie
title: Sour Cream Apple Pie II
